lead_paragraph: With an unwavering commitment to tradition, Augusta National has been accused of being stuck in the past but club chairman Billy Payne on Wednesday assured that the home of the Masters is prepared for change.

headline.print_headline: Augusta National Embraces Tradition, Prepares for Future
headline.main: Augusta National Embraces Tradition, Prepares for Future

snippet: With an unwavering commitment to tradition, Augusta National has been accused of being stuck in the past but club chairman Billy Payne on Wednesday assured that the home of the Masters is prepared for change....
